title: bonus health or max health on tahm kench
body:
i found two conflicting descriptions of tahm kenchs ult passive. one says he deals bonus magic damage based on max hp and the other deals damage based on his bonus health.

which is it?

i need a confirmation not conjecture

replies.body:
well there you have it. rito has spoken. 
i liked the idea of max hp though because you dont have to build health as aggressively in order to get magic damage out of it.
also a build with 5 hp items maxes out at about 285 bonus magic damage.
Stupid question, but is bonus health any amount of health you get that is NOT base health? Example = Runes, masteries, items, etc.

yes. there is a flat rate of magic damage then it is increased by bonus health. this way you get a bigger increase than max health but you need to be focused on health to get all of the damage out of it.

Whatever you see on the PBE/PBE updates is correct. The champion reveal can often times have an initial idea, then as they're bringing him out and working with him on the PBE they rework and change things for him. So PBE correct information, Reveal oudated information.
